body:
Fixes #2181 

@BarrySmith has a point.  I got annoyed enough about the file modifications to fix this.  The new `spack flake8` command runs all the checks in a temp directory and doesn't modify any files.  Oh and it's python and a spack command so you don't have to know where it lives.

@citibeth @adamjstewart @davydden @alalazo 

- Ported old run-flake8-tests qa script to `spack flake8` command.
- New command does not modify files in the source tree
- Copies files to a temp stage modifies them there, and runs tests.
- Updated docs and `run-flake8-tests` script to call `spack flake8`.
title: Add `spack flake8` command
